    • Uses of Event in com.vaadin.polymer.iron.event

      Subinterfaces of Event in com.vaadin.polymer.iron.event 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  ErrorEvent
      Fired when an error is received.
      interface  IronActivateEvent
      Fired when iron-selector is activated (selected or deselected).
      It is fired before the selected items are changed.
      Cancel the event to abort selection.
      interface  IronChangeEvent
      Fired when the checked state changes.
      interface  IronDeselectEvent
      Fired when an item is deselected
      interface  IronDocViewerComponentSelectedEvent
      Broadcast when another component is clicked on
      interface  IronFormElementRegisterEvent
      Fired when the element is added to an iron-form.
      interface  IronFormElementUnregisterEvent
      Fired when the element is removed from an iron-form.
      interface  IronFormErrorEvent
      Fired after the form is submitted and an error is received.
      interface  IronFormInvalidEvent
      Fired if the form cannot be submitted because itâ€™s invalid.
      interface  IronFormPresubmitEvent
      Fired before the form is submitted.
      interface  IronFormResetEvent
      Fired after the form is reset.
      interface  IronFormResponseEvent
      Fired after the form is submitted and a response is received.
      interface  IronFormSubmitEvent
      Fired after the form is submitted.
      interface  IronInputValidateEvent
      The iron-input-validate event is fired whenever validate() is called.
      interface  IronItemsChangedEvent
      Fired when the list of selectable items changes (e.g., items are
      added or removed).
      interface  IronLocalstorageLoadEmptyEvent
      Fired when loaded value does not exist.
      Event handler can be used to initialize default value.
      interface  IronLocalstorageLoadEvent
      Fired when value loads from localStorage.
      interface  IronOverlayCanceledEvent
      Fired when the iron-overlay is canceled, but before it is closed.
      Cancel the event to prevent the iron-overlay from closing.
      interface  IronOverlayClosedEvent
      Fired after the iron-overlay closes.
      interface  IronOverlayOpenedEvent
      Fired after the iron-overlay opens.
      interface  IronSelectEvent
      Fired when an item is selected
      interface  IronSwipeEvent
      Fired when a child element is swiped away.
      interface  KeysPressedEvent 
      interface  RequestEvent
      Fired when a request is sent.
      interface  ResponseEvent
      Fired when a response is received.
